summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lead Detail Documents section enhancement. All 16 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified with Documents section always visible, upload status indicators, View/Remove buttons, and delete confirmation dialog working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Lead without documents shows null for both document fields
Backend: Upload tender document returns success with document_url
Backend: Tender document persisted in lead after upload
Backend: Upload working sheet returns success with ws_ prefix
Backend: Working sheet persisted in lead after upload
Backend: Both documents can coexist on same lead
Backend: Delete tender document returns success
Backend: Tender document null after deletion, lead intact
Backend: Delete working sheet returns success
Backend: Working sheet null after deletion, lead intact
Backend: Delete non-existent tender document succeeds gracefully
Backend: Delete non-existent working sheet succeeds gracefully
Backend: Delete tender document from non-existent lead returns 404
Backend: Delete working sheet from non-existent lead returns 404
Backend: Upload invalid file type returns 400
Backend: Lead with part_number in products created correctly
Frontend: Documents section always visible (even without documents)
Frontend: Tender Document row visible with 'Customer Provided' label
Frontend: Working Sheet row visible with 'Internal Reference' label
Frontend: 'Not uploaded' status with gray X icon when no document
Frontend: 'Uploaded' status with green checkmark when document exists
Frontend: Document filename displayed when uploaded
Frontend: View button visible for uploaded documents
Frontend: Remove button visible for uploaded documents
Frontend: Remove button triggers confirmation dialog
Frontend: Dialog shows 'The lead record will not be affected' message
Frontend: Remove action deletes only document, not lead
Frontend: After removal, status shows 'Not uploaded'
Frontend: Success toast shown after document removal
Frontend: Part Number column visible in products table
seed_data_creation: Test documents uploaded to existing lead (ID: 1619f70c-c855-4684-a968-29a96c094a88) for testing. Tender document was removed during testing, working sheet remains.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Lead Detail page Documents section fully implemented and tested. Documents section is always visible showing Tender Document and Working Sheet rows. Each row shows upload status (Uploaded with green checkmark / Not uploaded with gray X). Uploaded documents show View and Remove buttons. Remove triggers AlertDialog confirmation. Delete endpoints: DELETE /api/leads/{lead_id}/tender-document and DELETE /api/leads/{lead_id}/working-sheet. Part Number column added to products table.
